Summary: extremely bright, moving quickly and leaving a trail...it exploded in a flash and disappeared
divs: Sighting Details The evening of August 3, 2008 at about 10:20 pm my husband and I were sitting outside with our neighbors on their deck when something in the sky off to the East caught our attention. It was extremely bright, multi-colored, moving quickly and leaving a trail...it exploded, or appeared to explode in a very bright flash and disappeared. It was amazing! When I came into the house that night, I began a thread in our local newspaper's forum, to see if anyone else had seen this same thing and if they knew what it was. There were several other people who confirmed that they had witnessed it also. The local paper (the forum is located on the paper's website) ended up doing a story on the "sighting" since several people admitted to seeing it also. Through their research they said that it was the International Space Station making a closeby pass. The Space Station theory just doesn't make sense. I don't know if it was a meteor, a bolide or something else but it was very pretty and had a very colorful tail trailing it. I looked up pictures of what the Space Station looks like from Earth as it makes a pass, and it looked nothing like what we saw. To this day we still wonder exactly what it was.
